author: egormajj
content:
My name is Egor, I am RubyScore head of business development.

It's a pleasure to meet you.

I am contacting you to discuss the possibility of requesting ETH Sepolia as developers, as we are looking to create our own faucet on the site and rank the entire ETH network and integrate it into the RubyScore dashboard.

RubyScore is an on-chain ranking protocol that evaluates wallet positions and performance based on various parameters.

Key features of the platform include a unique on-chain reputation system utilizing SBT, advanced analytics to evaluate 10+ parameters, and a distinctive ranking system with NFT rewards.

Here are some of our immediate plans:
- Create Faucet and Ethereum integration
- Create a wallet identification API and introduce API offerings to large blockchain projects and dApps ecosystems.
- Create a deferred transaction service
- SocialFi - a single decentralized rating layer on the blockchain in one place
I wasn't trying to advertise our project, I was just stating the goal. We just want to create our own Faucet for both developers and testers. Could you help with the Faucet Sepolia release?
